home__description: Passionate about learning, research, and contributing to advancements in AI, data science, and bioinformatics.
about__description: Undergraduate student majoring in AI and Data Science at USTC. My interests include large language models, natural language processing, and interdisciplinary AI applications.

research_experience2__description: Developed GoBang model using deep reinforcement learning, designed an English club communication platform using Django.
